function.description: Calculate the surface area and volume of a cone given its radius and height.
function.name: calculate_area_and_volume_of_cone

function.description: Solve mathematical problems using sympy for symbolic computation, especially for mathematical expressions.
function.name: solve_math_problem

equations.description: An array of mathematical expressions or equations to be solved.

variables.description: An array of variables involved in the equations.

function.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 3D space.
function.name: calculate_distance_3d

point1.description: The first point in the format [x, y, z]

point2.description: The second point in the format [x,y,z]

function.description: Solve mathematical problems using sympy for symbolic computation, supports solving equations and evaluating expressions.
function.name: solve_math_problem_fixed

equations.description: An array of mathematical equations to be solved.

variables.description: An array of variables involved in the equations.

function.description: Solve for a missing side in a right triangle using trigonometric ratios such as sine, cosine, or tangent.
function.name: solve_trigonometric_triangle

angle_degree.description: The angle in degrees for which to perform the calculation.

angle_type.description: The type of trigonometric function to use: 'sine', 'cosine', or 'tangent'.

known_side.description: The known side against the angle: opposite, adjacent, or hypotenuse.

known_value.description: The length of the known side.

function.description: Calculate the volume and surface area of a geometric shape given its dimensions.
function.name: calculate_code_properties

dimensions.description: The dimensions needed for the calculation, such as radius, height, etc.

shape.description: The type of the shape, e.g., cone, sphere, cylinder.

function.description: Evaluate and solve mathematical expressions or problems using sympy for symbolic computation.
function.name: evaluate_math_problem

problem_statement.description: The mathematical problem statement to be solved.

function.description: Solve mathematical tasks using sympy for symbolic computation, given equations and variables to solve for.
function.name: solve_task_with_sympy

equations.description: An array of mathematical equations or expressions to be solved.

variables.description: An array of variables to solve for.

function.description: Calculate the volume of a sphere given its radius.
function.name: calculate_volume_of_sphere
